Since these people also include someone else receiving even greater amounts including an additional 15 chips on top, let Z represent the final count for all others combined beyond Amora and Lainey – meaning, Z equals Y+Z_bonus where Z_bonus stands for zillions or whatever the unknown sum might add up too making Z larger than either X nor Y alone. We know now :X*2 <= Y<(X+1)*zillion & -(Z-(X+Y)+2)<=(-1*zillon), thus resulting equation becomes ,  2*(X^2)-((X+1)*Z)=Total Corn Chips Before Distribution . Solving using above information will give us required values accordingly !
